trait.name: Night Hunter
entries: The Fellwing Terror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight in darkness.

trait.name: Terrifying Screech
entries: As an action, the Fellwing Terror can emit a terrifying screech. Each creature within 60 feet that can hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the Fellwing Terror is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature succeeds on this saving throw, it is immune to the Terrifying Screech of all Fellwing Terrors for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Fellwing Terror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage.
